root.name: PowerHits: BattleTech
root.description: This compilation release offered BattleTech: The Crescent Hawk's Inception (1989), BattleTech: The Crescent Hawks' Revenge (1990), and MechWarrior (1989) in a single boxed package with both 5.25" and 3.5" floppy discs for the IBM PC (MS/DOS Compatible) and an abridged manual covering all three titles.
